game

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    The Database class stores all the game icons, names and facts, except for the difficult game.
    Version:
    1.0, May 21 2014., 1.1, May 24 2014. (Added launcher), 1.2, May 28 2014. (Added the alkaliMetals array to store the names.), 1.3, May 29 2014. (Alkali metal icons and javadoc), 1.4, May 30 2014. (Added acid cloud obstacle.), 1.5, May 31 2014. (Added all difficult level names, easy element icons upgraded), 1.6, June 3 2014. (Added base icon for medium.), 1.7, June 8 2014. (Added facts, missing facts for easy, currently using placeholders for testing purposes.)
    Author:
    Anqi Wu, Chusa Nguyen
